name: demote
description: Demotes a user by removing all roles above a specified role while keeping the selected role.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to demote.

options.name: role
options.description: Select the role for demotion.

options.name: reason
options.description: Select a reason for the demote.

name: promote
description: Promotes a user to a specified role.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to promote.

options.name: role
options.description: Select the role for promotion.

options.name: reason
options.description: Select a reason for promotion.

name: recruitment
description: Sends the recruitment information embed into #recruitment

name: rules
description: sends the rules info

name: supportinfo
description: Sends the support information embed into #support-info

name: accept
description: Accept a user into the clan

options.name: member
options.description: The member that you want to send a DM.

options.name: application-channel
options.description: The application channel where it needs to be sended in.

name: apply
description: Apply for the crew

name: close-application
description: Close a specific application channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The application channel name or ID to close

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for closing this application channel

name: deny
description: Deny a user from joining the crew

options.name: member
options.description: The member that you want to send a DM.

options.name: application-channel
options.description: The application channel where it needs to be sent in.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for denying this member.

name: clearcache
description: Deletes the cached slash commands for the current guild.

name: restart
description: Restarts the bot server.

name: status
description: Edits the activity status.

options.name: type
options.description: Values: PLAYING, WATCHING, LISTENING

options.name: value
options.description: The description.

options.name: url
options.description: The streaming URL.

name: help
description: Gets a list of commands to try.

options.name: command-name
options.description: What command would you like to learn more about, if any?

name: signal
description: If configured, this will store a command and make it available through our API.

options.name: signal
options.description: What signal/command would you like to run?

name: 8ball
description: Will give you a answer on your question.

options.name: question
options.description: The question that you want to ask.

name: clanmembers-eng
description: Shows all clan members from the english ARC clan.

name: convertcurrency
description: This will convert your currency to anoter currency.

options.name: old
options.description: The currency you have

options.name: new
options.description: The new currency that you want.

options.name: amount
options.description: The ammount that you want to convert.

name: corona
description: *No description provided.*

name: dadjoke
description: Get a random Dad joke.

name: roll
description: Roll a dice with a specified number of sides and get a random number.

options.name: sides
options.description: The number of sides on the dice (e.g., 6 for a standard six-sided die).

name: joke
description: Tells you a joke.

name: logo
description: Give you the information about a logo.

options.name: brand
options.description: The brand that you want to get the logo of.

name: randompassword
description: This will generate a random password for you.

options.name: lenght
options.description: The lenght of the password that you want.

name: fact
description: Tells you a random fact.

name: roleinfo
description: Get information about a specific role in the server.

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to get information about.

name: serverinfo
description: Gives you the information about the server.

name: translate
description: Translate text from one language to another.

options.name: source-language
options.description: The source language code (e.g., en for English)

options.name: target-language
options.description: The target language code (e.g., fr for French)

options.name: text
options.description: The text to translate

name: weather
description: Gets the current weather from the state.

options.name: state
options.description: The state that you want to get the current weather from.

name: activewinner
description: Announced the activity check winner.

options.name: member
options.description: Who do you want to strike?

name: activitycheck
description: Announced the activity check.

name: ban
description: Ban a user from the server.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to ban.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the ban.

name: kick
description: Kick a user from the server.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to kick.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the kick.

name: strike
description: Strikes a member

options.name: member
options.description: Who do you want to strike?

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for striking this member.

name: userroles
description: Gets the userroles from the member.

options.name: member
options.description: The member that you want to get the roles from.

name: warn
description: Warns a member

options.name: member
options.description: Who do you want to warn?

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for warning this member.

name: close
description: Close your support channel.

name: close-support
description: Close a specific support channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The support channel name or ID to close

name: support
description: Creates a support ticket.

name: lockmessage
description: Sends the lock info for trading and advises using /trade.

name: trade
description: Sends a trade request into #trading

options.name: item
options.description: The item that you want to trade

options.name: amount
options.description: How much do you want to trade?

options.name: item-wanted
options.description: Which item do you want?

options.name: amount-needed
options.description: How much do you want to have of the wanted item?

name: dm
description: DMs others using the bot.

options.name: member
options.description: The member that you want to send a DM.

options.name: message
options.description: The message that you want to send.

name: uptime
description: Gets the uptime of the bot
